pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Sunday, January 12, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Edmonton, Alberta

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a vigil to pay his respects and mourn the loss of the victims of the plane crash in Iran, and will deliver remarks.

Saville Community Sports Centre
11610 65 Avenue North West

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.
